data.title: “She Allows Me to Do What I Do as a Man,” Pierce Brosnan Reflects on His Marriage With Wife Keely
data.meta_description: Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith stand out as a resilient celebrity couple, having shared nearly three decades of partnership. In various interviews, Brosnan openly expresses his deep affection for his wife, and Smith reciprocates the same sentiments, reaffirming their enduring love for each other.
data.text:
Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith stand out as a resilient celebrity couple, having shared nearly three decades of partnership. In various interviews, Brosnan openly expresses his deep affection for his wife, and Smith reciprocates the same sentiments, reaffirming their enduring love for each other.

In 1994, while in Mexico, Pierce Brosnan crossed paths with Keely Shaye Smith, who was working as a TV correspondent at the time. Keely admitted in an interview that she was instantly drawn to Pierce, describing him as “tall, dark, and handsome — everything that everybody would immediately be attracted to.” She mentioned being intrigued by his charming aura and the mischievous glint in his eyes, leaving her quite captivated.

After their initial encounter, Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith went on a memorable date a few days later. Sitting beneath the night sky, holding hands, they watched fireworks illuminating the sky above them, engrossed in conversation until the early morning hours. In an interview, the actor expressed his longing for Keely regardless of location.

Three years after they initially met, Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith welcomed their first son, Dylan, into the world. Following four years, they had their second son, Paris. During this time, the couple also exchanged vows, solidifying their commitment to each other.

Keely expressed her heartfelt appreciation for her husband, thanking him for being her partner in the exhilarating and unpredictable journey of parenthood. She wrote, “Your heart is so big, generous, tender and compassionate. You inspire me every day, and you continue to make me laugh. God bless you! My heart is filled with gratitude.”

Pierce highlights the significance of spending meaningful time together as an essential element of their joyful marriage. Reflecting on his first marriage, he acknowledges the happiness it brought and feels incredibly fortunate to have found love again. He expresses profound gratitude for Keely, attributing their union to destiny, “We were meant to find each other. I thank God for her every day. When Keely looks at me, I go weak. I love her vitality, her passion. She has this strength that I wouldn’t be able to live without.”

Pierce Brosnan has praised his wife for being an incredible support system throughout his Hollywood journey. He admires her unwavering encouragement, especially when his work took him away from home: “She allows me to go out into the wild blue yonder and do what I do as a man, as an actor.”

AF Archive / Graham Whitby Boot / Mary Evans Picture Library / East News

Keely has been pivotal in nurturing Pierce Brosnan’s passion for art. The actor, known for his talent on-screen, recently showcased his artistic flair with his debut solo exhibit titled So Many Dreams at Art Basel Miami. Pierce acknowledged Keely’s significant role in making this artistic milestone a reality: “You made it happen, my love.”

Paul Marks / Broadimage / EAST NEWS

Pierce Brosnan firmly believes in following the heart’s guidance and values the marriage bond. He says, “I’ve been a married man most of my life — that’s how I like it. I’m one of those guys who believes you need a strong woman in your life.” Meanwhile, Keely Shaye Smith admires Pierce’s intellect and captivating personality, highlighting that his true beauty radiates from within.

AF Archive / Mark Liley / Mary Evans Picture Library / East News

It seems the couple enjoys spending time together, especially at their cottage with acres of land meticulously tended by Keely. Pierce Brosnan enthusiastically notes, “I dig ditches for new plants, do the mulching. We do that together. It is a very simple life out there. We have built homes together. We designed a home in Malibu... well, she did, really. My attention span goes, while she is a perfectionist and consequently has built the boys and me these gorgeous homes.”

Pierce admires his wife’s qualities, emphasizing her cool demeanor, wonderful sense of humor, and strong self-assuredness as a woman, which provides him with security and faith in their relationship. On the other hand, Keely acknowledges the widespread admiration for Pierce, attributing it to his genuine love and appreciation for women.

Pierce Brosnan has notably demonstrated his unwavering support and protective nature towards his wife. When faced with criticism targeting Smith’s weight, Brosnan has defended her, exhibiting a strong stance against those who sought to undermine or judge her physical appearance.
